attributes.additional_details: As a very keen sports fan, I thought it would be great if Mr Kenny Dalglish becomes a Knight and will have Sir has his title, Sir Alex Ferguson is a good example, Fantastic sporting history one of the best ever home grown sporting talents of all time. I think Kenny Dalglish should also become a Knight because look what he's done for the city of Liverpool, he made scotland proud, he made celtic football club proud and also blackburn rovers! this man is truely amazing, and he should be rewarded from the queen for his work. thanks
